title: Andy Sealy is Living Her Dash
description:
Andy Sealy, a 30-something Philadelphia woman, finds a lump in her breast. Her prognosis is Stage-4 incurable cancer. But besides the gene for aggressive breast cancer — hope, optimism, and resilience run through her DNA. Her diagnosis starts Andy on a path to helping others.

Follow Andy on Instagram: @justaskwithandysealy and @livingmydash24

Donate to METAvivor, a charity that gives 100% of donations to metastatic breast cancer research

Listen ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App. 

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--
